home.title: Welcome to Hotel Italia
home.description: Comfort in the heart of Chiclayo
home.title2: part of the Route of Pope Leo XIV
home.chiclayo: known as the “Capital of Friendship”, was the pastoral home of Pope Leo XIV. A place where history, faith, and culture meet, ideal for your next visit.
home.subtitle_section: Discover why Hotel Italia is the preferred choice in Chiclayo
home.description_section: At Hotel Italia, we combine strategic location, comfort, and exceptional service to ensure you have a unique experience, whether for business or pleasure.
home.wifiDesc: Stay connected at all times with our free wifi available in all areas.
home.bathDesc: Enjoy the comfort of a private bathroom in every room.
home.waterDesc: Access to hot and cold water 24 hours a day.
home.fanDesc: All our rooms are equipped with a fan for your comfort.
home.tvDesc: Relax watching your favorite shows on our LED screens.
home.cleaningDesc: We keep our rooms and common areas spotless every day.
home.securityDesc: CCTV security cameras in all public areas of the hotel.
home.receptionDesc: Personalized reception service available 24 hours a day.
home.luggageDesc: Free luggage storage service for your convenience.
home.checkOutDesc: Check-out is at 1 pm the next day.

turismo.title: In the Footsteps of the Pope in Lambayeque
turismo.descripcion: “Follow the footsteps of Pope Leo XIV through sacred temples, living traditions, and communities that marked his pastoral journey.”
turismo.lugar1Descripcion: A majestic 19th-century neoclassical temple and a religious symbol of the city. Here, Pope Leo XIV served as bishop for over eight years.
turismo.lugar2Descripcion: An emblematic historic building that houses an exhibition on his pastoral work. It highlights his solidarity and support during key moments such as the pandemic.
turismo.lugar3Titulo: Sanctuary of Our Lady of Peace
turismo.lugar3Descripcion: A temple dedicated to the Virgin and a heart of local spiritual life. Here he strengthened pastoral work and Marian devotion.
turismo.lugar4Descripcion: A colonial church with more than 470 years of tradition. Bishop Prevost often participated in Masses and religious festivities here.
turismo.lugar5Titulo: Santa María Magdalena Church – Ciudad Eten
turismo.lugar5Descripcion: Home of the Divine Child of the Miracle and a center of Eucharistic fervor. He supported its recognition as the Eucharistic City of the world.
